reviews.text: Some really wonderful Greek Middle Eastern food. My favorite is the Kafta kabob pita and the chicken shawarma. The staff is polite and wonderful.
This spot  consistently has the best chicken Schwarma I've ever had. The sauce is extra garlicky and the chicken perfectly seasoned. Their fries are...
First time coming in here. Everything was super fresh and tasty. Will definitely be coming back again. Good spot in Bexley.
